QuestData.Title: A Flash of Bronze...
QuestData.Description: As you survey the devastation of the vale, a flash of bronze catches your eye. Unless you're mistaken, a tiny gnome is trying to catch your attention from the balcony above Mogu'shan Palace, just outside of the Seat of Knowledge.$b$bYou should see what she wants.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Chromie outside of the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Chromie outside of the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
